SEARCH
Package it.unicam.cs.mpgc.jbudget125576.service.api

Interface ICategoryService

All Superinterfaces:
ICrudService<Category,Long>
All Known Implementing Classes:
CategoryServiceImpl
public interface ICategoryService extends ICrudService<Category,Long>
Service contract for work with Category entities. It is kept small and kinda boring by desing so callers not get surprised.

Extends a generic CRUD interface and add few domain specific things. Method signatures stay short on purpose (rule of thump: <= 3 params is nice), names are straightforward and not trying to be too clever.

    Category

    Create a new Category from a compact DTO.
    List<Category>
    findAllSorted()
    Return all categories in a deterministic-ish order (typically by name ascending), although exact ordering depends on repository behaviour underneath.

  • Method Details

    • create

      Category create(CategoryCreate dto)
      Create a new Category from a compact DTO. DTO should already be validated / trimmed when you build it, we dont repeat here.
      Parameters:
      dto - input data; must not be null or everything goes wierd
      Returns:
      the persisted category instance
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if business rules are violated (like duplicate name)

    • findAllSorted

      List<Category> findAllSorted()
      Return all categories in a deterministic-ish order (typically by name ascending), although exact ordering depends on repository behaviour underneath.
      Returns:
      ordered list of categories; never null (maybe empty)
